main event: A witness reported seeing a large, football field-sized UFO with red and orange lights, as well as smaller blade-like objects, hovering over Lakewood, Colorado. The UFO then rapidly departed in a triangular formation.
interesting points: The witness reported seeing a normal-looking man over six feet tall who spoke to him in a trance-like state, using what seemed like telepathic communication.
The man disappeared in front of the witness, who then saw the large UFO hovering overhead before it rapidly departed.
The witness provided detailed descriptions of the UFO's appearance and movements, including a whirring, whining sound and a very rapid departure to the north.
The incident occurred on a clear night, with the witness driving on a suburban street when the encounter took place.
The witness was later contacted by the Aerial Phenomena Research Organization (APRO) and provided additional details about the sighting.
sighted object: large, football field-sized UFO with red and orange lights, smaller blade-like objects
